case.title: User is able to open the "Search" overlay by tapping on "Magnifying glass" logo on the top right in the header.
"Magnifying glass" logo displayed on the top right in the header.
User is able to receive a "Leider nichts gefunden." error message by entering an invalid value into the search field.
User is able to receive a "Leider nichts gefundeb." error message displayed beyond the search bar.
The search results should not be able to display if the user enters an invalid term into the search field.
The search results should be able to display if the user enters an valid term into the search field.
Channel cards should be able to display in first positions.
User is able to update immediately search results by adding letters to the search field.
User is able to update immediately search results by removing letters in the search field.
Search terms should be able to save in the overlay when the user goes to the details page and then uses the "Back" button.
[Logged out]: User should be able to open the sidebar by taping the login link on the top right of the header
User is able to be redirected to the registration page by tapping the "Login" link.
User is able to receive an "E-Mail Adresse ist nicht qutlig" error message by entering a not valid email.
[Anmelden] button should be able to be inactive until the user enters a valid email.
User is able to open the keyboard on mobile by tapping in textbox.
User is able to receive a "Du bist jetzt mit deiner E-Mail-Adresse <useremail> eingeloggt. Viel SpaB!" message after tapping on the link in the mail.
User is able to receive a confirmation email with a confirmation link after entering an unregistered email in the "E-Mail-Adresse" textbox.
User is able to be redirected to the confirmation page by tapping link in the mail.
User is able to tap on [Weiter] button to proceed with registration.
User is able to be redirected to the previous email page by tapping on the "E-Mail-Adresse falsch?" link.
"Shon, dass du da bist" headline should be able displayed on the confirmation page.
"Joyn" logo should be able displayed on the confirmation page.
"Nicht du?" link should be able displayed on the confirmation page.
User is able to be redirected to the previous page by tapping the "Nicht du?" link.
User is able to be redirected to the password creation page by tapping on the [Weiter] button.
The password creation page should contain "Damit dein Account geschützt ist, überleg dir ein möglichst sicheres Passwort." message.
The password creation page should contain the "Erstelle dein neues Passwort" headline.
The password creation page should contain the "Joyn" logo.
The password creation page should contain the filled "Email" field.
The password creation page should contain the "Passwort" filed.
The password creation page should contain the [Weiter] button.
[Weiter] button should be able to be inactive until the user enters a valid password in "Passwort" field.
The "Passwort" field should contain a minimum of 6 chars.
Requirements for the "Passwort" field should be displayed after tapping on the "Passwort" field.
User is able to receive an error message if data in "Passwort" field is not valid.
"6 Zeichen" requirement should display below the "Password" field when user tapping on the field.
"Klein- und GroBbuchstaben" requirement should display below the "Password" field when user tapping on the field.
"1 Zahl" requirement should display below the "Password" field when user tapping on the field.
"6 Zeichen" requirement should be marked as done if requirements are met.
"Klein- und GroBbuchstaben" requirement should be marked as done if requirements are met.
"1 Zahl" requirement should be marked as done if requirements are met.
User is able to receive "Joyn ist im Ausland nicht oder nur begrenzt nutzbar." message if the regions outside the Germany.
The selected textbox should be marked with a white line.
"Registration" page should contain a [Speichern] button.
[Speichern] button should be able to be inactive until the user enters all text boxes with valid data.
Colored circle around the account icon in the top right corner.
User is able to be redirect to the "Home" page by tapping on the registration button.
"Registration" page should contain an "E-Mail-Adresse" text box.
"Registration" page should contain a [Apple] button.
"Registration" page should contain a [Facebook] button.
"Registration" page should contain a [Google] button.
"Registration" page should contain a [netID] button.
User is able to enter an email in "E-Mail-Adresse" text box that contains the special character - "@".
User is able to enter an email in "E-Mail-Adresse" text box that contains the special character - ".".
User is able to enter an email in "E-Mail-Adresse" text box that contains a maximum of 60 chars.
"Registration" page should contain a [Anmelden] button.
"Registration" page should contain a "Tag" text box.
"Registration" page should contain a "Monat" text box.
"Registration" page should contain a "Jahr" text box.
"Registration" page should contain a "manlich" radiobutton.
"Registration" page should contain a "weiblich" radiobutton.
"Registration" page should contain a "divers" radiobutton.
[Logged out]: User should be able to open the the email check page by taping the "Login" link in the sidebar
[Logged out]: User should be able to open the email check page by taping the bookmark button
[Logged out]:The email check page should contain the Joyn logo
[Logged out]: The email check page should contain the "Willkommen bei Joyn" headline
[Logged out]: The email check page should contain the “Möchtest du dich registrieren oder einloggen? Gib einfach deine E-Mail-Adresse ein.” message
[Logged out]: The email check page should contain the email field with the placeholder “E-mail-Adresse”
[Logged out]: The email check page should contain the “oder” line
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with Facebook account by taping the Facebook button on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with Google account by taping the Google button on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with Apple account by taping the Apple button on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with Telegram account by taping the Telegram button on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with Amazon account by taping the Amazon button on the email check page
[Logged out]: The input in the email field on the email check page should match the pattern [name]@[domain].[top-domain]
[Logged out]: The [name] part of the email in the email field on the email check page should contain only latin letters
[Logged out]: User should not be able to log in with 61 symbol in the email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with 60 symbol in the email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with 20 symbol in the email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should not be able to log in with 5 symbol in the email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should not be able to log in with an empty email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should not be able to log in with SQL/HTML/JS tags in the email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: The invitation email should be sent, if user taps the [Anmelden] button with unregistered email in the email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with 6 symbols in the email field on the email check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in by filling the fields on the check pages with already registered data
[Logged out]:The URL of the check pages should starts with https://interaction.7pass.de/
[Logged out]: User should be redirected to the password check page after taping the "Login" link in the sidebar, if he was logged in during previous sessions
[Logged out]: User should be able to open the password check page by filling email field on the email check page with registered email and taping the [Anmelden] button
[Logged out]: User should be able to complete the log in process by filing the password field on the password check page with registered password and taping the [Anmelden] button
[Logged out]: User should not be able to complete the log in process by filing the password field on the password check page with unregistered password and taping the [Anmelden] button
[Logged out]: User should be able to return to the email check page by taping the “Nicht du?” link on the password check page
[Logged out]: User should be redirected to the initial page after successful log in
[Logged out]:The password check page should contain the Joyn logo
[Logged out]:The password check page should contain the "Willkommen zurück" headline
[Logged out]:The password check page should contain the “Gib einfach dein Passwort ein und es geht direkt weiter.” message
[Logged out]:The password check page should contain the email, associated with user
[Logged out]:The password check page should contain the password field with the placeholder “Passwort”
[Logged out]: User should be able to switch between visible/invisible password mode by tapping the eye icon in the password field on the password check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to open the password change page by taping the “Passwort vergessen?” link n the password check page
[Logged out]: User should not be able to log in with 5 symbol in the password field on the password check page
[Logged out]: User should be able to log in with 6 symbol in the password field on the password check page
The input in the password field on the password check page should not exceed 20 symbols
Resume lane "Jetzt weiterschauen" should be able to display a maximum of 20 resume cards.
Resume lane "Jetzt weiterschauen" not should be able to display an "Alle >" link.
The 1st resume card in the resume lane "Jetzt weiterschauen" is the latest watched asset.
Resume card should be able to contain a cover image.
Resume card should be able to contain a progress bar at the bottom.
Resume card should be able to contain an art logo.
Resume card should be able to contain an title.
Resume card should be able to contain a "Play" icon.
Resume card should be able to contain a season.
Resume card should be able to contain an episode number for serials.
Resume card should be able to contain the remaining duration of the asset for movies.
Resume card should be able to contain a vibrant color.
User is able to resume the playback by tapping on a resume card.
Next episode should be able to be displayed in a resume lane when the user finishes watching the previous episode.
The "Series details" page should be able to display detailed information about the series at the bottom by tapping on the card.
User is able to be redirect on the "Series details" page by tapping on the card.
Available seasons in descending order should be able to displays at the bottom of the "Series detail" page.
The [Play] button should be able to displays at "Series detail" page.
The [Resume] button should be able to displays at "Series detail" page.
User should be able to start the video by tapping on the [Play] button.
User should be able to resume the video by tapping on the [Resume] button.
The "Episode" selector should be able to display all available episodes when the user taps on the season number.
The "Episode" selector should be able to display available episodes of the currently selected season.
The "Episode" card should be able to display cover.
The "Episode" card should be able to display episode title
The "Episode" card should be able to display duration.
The "Episode" card should be able to display airdate.
The "Episode" card should be able to display availability flag (if available).
The "Episode" card should be able to display the progress bar.
User is able to starts episode by tapping on "Episode" card.
User is able to start latest watched episode by tapping on the [Play] button.
User is able to resume latest watched episode by tapping on the [Resume] button.
User is able to open the video player by tapping on the card.
The video player should contain close button.
The video player should contain progress bar (in vibrant color).
The video player should contain art logo.
The video player should contain fallback text.
The video player should contain series number.
The video player should contain episode number.
The video player should contain series title.
The video player should contain the next episode button, only for series.
The video player should contain a skip-forward button.
The video player should contain a rewind button.
The video player should contain a [Play] button.
The video player should contain a [Pause] button.
The video player should contain the remaining time.
The video player should contain a volume button.
The video player should contain the fullscreen button.
The video player should contain a ad logo (for the not premium users).
User is able to scrub the progress bar, the playback goes on from the position where the scrubber point was released.
User is able to fade out UI by tapping on any place on the player.
User is able to change the rotation/orientation of the player.

section.name: "Du hast schon einen Account? Login" link

case.title: The watch button on the Series details page should indicate the last watched episode name
The watch button on the Series details page should indicate the last watched episode view progress
The Live lane should be placed on the Home page, beyond the Featured lane
Only logged in user should be able observe the Live lane
The Live lane should contain the Live Cards
The Live lane should not contain the [All] button
User should be able to scroll horizontally the Live lane
The Live Card should contain a full-width image
The Live Card should contain a "LIVE" tag
The Live Card should contain an airtimes mark
The Live Card should contain a program title
The Live Card should contain a [Play] button
User should be redirected to the Live TV page after taping the Live Card in the Live lane
User should be able to watch the Live TV content by taping the corresponding Live Card in the Live lane
The Live TV page should contain the Live TV UI
User should be able to watch Live TV videos on the Live TV page via the Live TV UI
User should be able to observe the currently available Live TV videos by vertical scrolling of the EPG list
User should be able to open the Live TV video by click/taping the EPG of the video in the EPG list in the Live TV UI
User should be able to observe the EPG announcement by sliding the EPG horizontally in the Live TV UI
User should be able to switch on/of the fulscreen mode for a Live TV video by click/taping the fulscreen button in the Live TV UI
User should be able to watch Live TV video in the Live TV UI in windowed mode in portrait orientation
The EGP should be present in the Live TV UI, below the Live TV video when it is played in windowed mode in portrait orientation
User should be able to watch Live TV video in the Live TV UI in windowed mode in landscape orientation
User should be able to watch Live TV video in the Live TV UI in fullscreen mode in portrait orientation
User should be able to watch Live TV video in the Live TV UI in fullscreen mode in landscape orientation
The EGP and EGP announcements in the Live TV UI should be changed when the video ends
The Live TV UI should contain a color gradient in the background, same as the channels color
The Live TV UI should contain a close icon
The Live TV UI should contain a progress bar
The Live TV UI should display the remaining time of current video
The Live TV UI should contain a fullscreen icon
The Live TV UI should contain a sound volume icon
The Live TV UI should contain an EPG list with EPG's
The EPG in the Live TV UI should contain the Live TV video timing
The EPG in the Live TV UI should contain the Live TV video name
The EPG in the Live TV UI should contain the Live TV video progress bar
User should be able to proceed the watching the Live TV video after inerruption happens
User should be able to watch Live TV video in the Live TV UI without lags and sync issues, when internet bandwidth >= 10 Mb/s
User should be able to change the orientation of the Live TV UI by changing the device orientation
User should be able to open the Live TV UI by click/taping the [Live TV] button in the bottom navigation bar
User should be able to watch all the videos, excluding Live TV ones, with VOD player
User should be able to watch VOD video without lags and sync issues, when internet bandwidth > 10 Mb/s
The quality of the VOD video should be not less than HD
User should be able to proceed the watching the VOD video after inerruption happens
User should be able to use VOD player controls smoothly and clearly
The total energy consumption of the app should not prevail 300mAh/h
User should be able to find the prewiously briefly viewed VOD videos in the Resume lane
The autoplay notification should appear in the VOD in 20 seconds before the episode ends
The autoplay notification in the VOD should appear only if the following episode is available
The autoplay notification in the VOD should contain the title of series
The autoplay notification in the VOD should contain the season/episode number and title of the next episode
The autoplay notification in the VOD should contain a countdown
The autoplay notification in the VOD should contain a [Jetzt abspielen] button
The autoplay notification in the VOD should contain a [Ausblenden] button
If the one exist, the following episode should start after the current episode finishes
The autoplay notification should not appear in the VOD, if there is no following episode of the series
The standard VOD UI should not be indicated when autoplay happens
The user should be able to hide the autoplay notification in the VOD by taping the [Ausblenden] button in the notification
The user should be able to forward to the following episode by taping the [Jetzt abspielen] button in the autoplay notification in the VOD
